tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SeasonalAgriculturalProductivity (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  year INT,
  crop_type VARCHAR(50),
  planting_season VARCHAR(50),
  harvest_season VARCHAR(50),
  productivity_index FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Crop_Data (
    crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(255),
    planting_date DATE,
    harvesting_date DATE,
    yield_amount INT
);

CREATE TABLE Weather_Data (
    weather_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    precipitation FLOAT,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Seasonal_Trends (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    year INT,
    region VARCHAR,
    season VARCHAR,
    productivity DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Weather_Data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    year INT,
    region VARCHAR,
    season VARCHAR,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    rainfall DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Crop_Yield (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    year INT,
    region VARCHAR,
    crop VARCHAR,
    yield DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    rainfall FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE productivity_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farmer_id INT,
    crop_id INT,
    data_id INT,
    productivity_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE SeasonalTrends (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    year INT,
    month VARCHAR(20),
    productivity DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE CropData (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(50),
    yield DECIMAL,
    profit DECIMAL,
    planting_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherConditions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    rainfall DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE FarmManagement (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    farm_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    manager_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ProductionForecast (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(50),
    projected_yield DECIMAL,
    projected_profit DECIMAL,
    forecast_date DATE
)
